Name: Mock Margarita
Ingredients: 5 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of salt rim & lime wedge.
Review: While this is a long way from a fine 100% agave tequila based Margarita, the flavour is surprisingly reminiscent of an alcoholic Margarita.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Cheri Loughlin AKA The Intoxicologist, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Mock Margarita contains 119 calories
